page.title: 12Godwin's Peat Works (2)
page.content: {3. STERILISATION} The peat is fed into a rotator. Sand is added and the rotator turns to mix the two.It can sterilise 5 tons of peat in an hour. The peat and sand mixture is heated to be{sterilised.}In the machine there is a hole and flames come out of it. No-one is allowed to enter the sterilisation room when the rotator is working.The smoke, heat and dust would be very dangerous to your health.The highest temperature that the peat reaches is{70 degrees} centigrade. Any higher and it would burn. {4. THE ADDITION OF LIME AND FERTILISER When the peat has been sterilised lime and fertiliser are added to it. It gives off odours and is hot.6 ounces of fertiliser are added to a bushel of peat for grow bags (i.e. 150 grammes to 36.37 litres).
